name: Wilderness Supervision
description:
The local scouting organization is going on a campout, and you find yourself to be the only chaperone. Go through the campsite and make sure all of your tasks get completed, and keep your easily distracted campers happy by the end of the night.

How to Play:

Click anywhere on the ground to move the Chaperone to that spot. Click on a camper to select them. With a camper selected, you can click anywhere on the ground or at one of the task areas to direct them there. Campers at task areas will work on them, but can get distracted and wander off to talk with others. 

Forcing a camper to work on a task lower's their Happiness and Energy, which is regained by letting them relax. Right clicking a camper opens up a window showing how they feel and what they are doing, and right clicking the chaperone opens a panel listing remaining tasks. Try to accomplish all the tasks while keeping the campers happy before time runs out!

Controls:

Left click - Move, select camper, assign camper to station

Right click - Open camper or chaperone details menu

Escape - Pause and unpause game
